text:
Wandersnap | Bali, Indonesia | Full-time | Onsite

We connect travelers with local snappers to capture selfie-free holiday moments. Covering 30+ destinations around Asia. For every booking, $5 goes towards training low-opportunity youth in photography, so they too can create art for a living.

Our founding team includes experts in marketing, technology, and product, with successful entrepreneurial exits under their belts. We are looking for an equally talented developers to help us take our platform to the next level. You either live in Indonesia or you are willing to relocate.

Roles

- Front-end developer: React, Redux, React-Native

- Back-end developer: Node, golang, elixir, aws lamda, php, postgresql

Apply: join@wandersnap.co

https://www.wandersnap.co
